name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Looty! Stash search for Path of Exile

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Looty! Helps you quickly find items by their stats or name in large Path of Exile stashes.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Looty puts all your sweet Path of Exile loots into a searchable datagrid. If you have a stash of any size, there is no faster way to find a piece of loot in it than using Looty.
